data.title: Senior Software Developer
tasks: Acting as technical reference for 3 mobile teams for a Banking client, ensuring proper integration of micro-apps in the Shell application using Callstack Repack.
Managing artifact lifecycle through GitHub Actions pipelines and JFrog Artifactory, ensuring that each squad's functionalities are efficiently integrated as versioned dependencies.
Enhanced user experience in AI chat (Conversational Banking) through Optimistic Updates, eliminating perceived latency in real-time interactions.

data.title: Frontend Developer
tasks: Implemented web pages with Next.js, achieved a 25% reduction in load times through SSR/SSG techniques and optimized components.
Developed mobile solutions with React Native, optimized state management with Zustand/Redux Toolkit, reducing re-renders by 35%.
Integrated microservices built with Java Spring Boot, creating robust interfaces for REST APIs and improving communication between architectural layers.

data.title: Frontend Developer
tasks: Built a dashboard for managing platform data and resources with Next.js, increasing request response speed by 25% with Redux Toolkit.
Developed optimized custom hooks to reduce re-renders, using advanced hooks like useMemo and useCallback.
Integrated serverless REST APIs on AWS and developed a mobile app with React Native following MVVM patterns and Clean Architecture, achieving a 15% codebase reduction.

data.title: Programmer
tasks: Provided IT support with Python and VBA for scripting and task automation.
Developed HMI interfaces with TIA Portal.
Programmed PLCs using SCL and Ladder.

data.title: IT Engineer
tasks: Provided back-office support and scripting with Python, JavaScript, and Visual Basic Macros.
Designed electromechanical engineering using CAD software.
